`rnaturalearth` is a useful package for loading data from 
[Natural Earth](https://www.naturalearthdata.com/).

# Required packages

This skills page uses the following packages:

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(rnaturalearthdata)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(here)
```

# Loading country boundaries

The `ne_countries()` function will load national boundaries.

Here is how you load the full set of 177 countries available from rnaturalearth

```{r}
world <- ne_countries(returnclass = "sf")
```

There are 

```{r}
world <- ne_countries(type = "tiny_countries",
                      returnclass = "sf")
```
